casebody.data:
MEARES
v.
DANA CORPORATION, et al. No. 502P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2009. Margaret M. Kingston, Charlotte, for Dana Corporation, et al. Vernon Sumwalt, Mark T. Sumwalt, Charlotte, for Meares.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of November 2008 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion for Stay Dissolved by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of February 2009."
